response.original_title: Forsenses - A Fascinating Journey into Nature & Sound
response.overview: Forsenes  A symphony for eyes and ears: Forsenses it the first installment of the Blu-ray Disc series blu::elements that brings to life the full optical and acoustic potential of HD Definition.  This ambitious project combined fascinating HD-shoots of the elements - water, earth, air and fire - with a specially composed 3D surround chill-out soundtrack, to make this an audiovisual symphony for the senses.
response.tagline: forsenses - A Fascinating Journey into Nature & Sound
response.title: Forsenses - A Fascinating Journey into Nature & Sound

titles.title: 蓝色元素 - 风光音乐纪录片
